text: Good solid Indian fare. My favourite here is the keema kuchar. Didn’t like the raita, but other than that good place for beers and Indian food.
Good authentic Indian food options and most imply my fave Guinness draft on tap!

The food here is incredible, one of the best North Indian cuisines in Singapore! The Barrels team was really professional in their service and friendly too! Came here to chill, drink, watch some football and patrons playing pool:)
the buffalo cauliflower, butter chicken and naan basket were super yummy!! affordable drinks and there’s even a pool table.

tl;dr decent taste, small quality and on the expensive side.

Pretty easy place to find beside paddy hills. This place have a bar and it is also an Indian restaurant, haven't seen this combo before. Taste is decent.

Lamb korma is very good, but has about 90g of meat for $19 (see pics)
Butter chicken is a bit too sweet for my liking and has about 100g of meat for $19
Chicken Biryani @$13.

The price to value for here not great, I think it is quite expensive for the amount of food you get.

Overall I would rate this place with the following:

Location: 6/10
Ambient: 8/10
Taste: 7/10
Service: 7/10
Price: 3/10
